calculations.name: MTM Stress T (In CAD)
calculations.tableau_expression:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [Max Date]= [RpDate] then [MTM Stress (in CAD)] else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Parameters].[End Date] then [MTM Stress (in CAD)] else 0 END END

calculation_context.Expression:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [Max Date]= [RpDate] then [MTM Stress (in CAD)] else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Parameters].[End Date] then [MTM Stress (in CAD)] else 0 END END

calculated_fields.MTM Stress (in CAD):
((IF [Cash curr]="EUR" THEN [Parameters].[Parameter 9] ELSEIF [Cash curr]="GBP" THEN [Parameters].[EUR Shift (copy)_2036471465060552715] END))
*(IF [Cash curr]="EUR" THEN -[DV01 (In USD)] *100 *[Parameters].[Use Custom Date0]
ELSEIF [Cash curr]="GBP" THEN -[DV01 (In USD)] *100 * [Parameters].[Use Custom Date0] END)
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
